column4: Anybody have any idea why I have a really small font size in some program option-menus, xmms and vlc for example..?
what can i do about it..?
not the hugest fan of gtk 1.x in the world... was the reason I started using KDE in the first place.
Rhythmbox for audio... Totem or mplayer for movies...
sorry i'm a total newbie :) but what is the easiest way to change to KDE?
can you do it with the synaptic..?
ahh... you don't want KDE... you just want to use apps that aren't gtk1.x
but kde could be nice too?
I guess... I don't really like KDE anymore...
GNOME is a lot nicer/less annoying...
tell me what is the difference between removal and complete removal in the synaptic?
removal uninstalls... complete removal gets rid of config files too....
ignore kent... if you are familier with dpkg ... complete is --purge or -P
have the font thing in audacity too is there an alternative recommend?
